availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky native. Married John F. Caldwell. Mother of John W. Caldwell. Hickman County farmer in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, unknown district, stamped p. 18. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow District, p. 21. Find A Grave, "Isabelle Holland Caldwell (1814-1878)" Memorial #118644241 (http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=118644241&ref=acom) (accessed 14 June 2016).
